project.name: dont touch your face
project.notes: This illustrates a use of a deep learning model called PoseNet. It defines blocks for obtaining up to 17 locations on one or more people (nose, elbow, knee, etc.). This program tracks the eyes, nose, and wrists and mirrors their movements. If a hand comes close to the face a warning is issued.

scene.name: dont touch your face
scene.notes: This illustrates a use of a deep learning model called PoseNet. It defines blocks for obtaining up to 17 locations on one or more people (nose, elbow, knee, etc.). This program tracks the eyes, nose, and wrists and mirrors their movements. If a hand comes close to the face a warning is issued.

block.comment: If nearly transparent location can't be trusted.

block-definition.s: Follow pose %'pose' and adjust y by %'adjustment'

block.comment: The fainter I look the less confident we are about the pose.

block-definition.comment: Reports the value of the 'key' in a table that is a list of pairs of keys and values.

block.comment: Not sure if both eyes can be seen so just guess how far apart they are.

block-definition.s: body poses of costume %'costume' $nl using model %'model' $nl using %'transform type' coordinates $nl with these options: %'options'
block-definition.comment: Reports the locations of 17 or 33 body parts for each body detected in the costume. Three models are available: MoveNet is an ultra fast and accurate model that detects 17 keypoints of a body. BlazePose can detect 33 keypoints, it provides additional keypoints for face, hands and feet. It reports both 2D and 3D locations. PoseNet can detect multiple poses, each pose contains 17 keypoints. For full documentation including options click the following help: https://github.com/tensorflow/tfjs-models/tree/master/pose-detection

input.options: MoveNet is an ultra fast and accurate model that detects 17 keypoints of a body. BlazePose can detect 33 keypoints, it provides additional keypoints for face, hands and feet. PoseNet can detect multiple poses, each pose contains 17 keypoints.

custom-block.s: Poses or landmarks of costume %s using %txt %br with options %mult%s %br do with response %cmdRing %br unless if error %cmdRing

block.comment: Turn the result into a form easier to see and use.

block-definition.comment: Reports a costume using the camera.

custom-block.s: Create costume from camera %b and pass it to %cmdRing

block-definition.s: Create costume from camera %'mirrored' and pass it to %'process costume'
block-definition.comment: Creates a costume from the video camera and passes it the 'process costume' blocks.

block-definition.s: transform %'coordinate' as %'x or y' coordinate to %'type of transform'
block-definition.comment: Converts costume coordinates to stage or percentage

block-definition.s: Poses or landmarks of costume %'costume' using %'model name' $nl with options %'options' $nl do with response %'do with response' $nl unless if error %'handle error'
block-definition.comment: This is the workhorse behind the reporters for the body and hand poses and face landmarks.

input.options: MoveNet PoseNet BlazePose MediaPipeFaceDetector MediaPipeFaceMesh MediaPipeHands ARPortraitDepth

custom-block.s: Follow pose %l and adjust y by %n

scripts.comment: Adjust y by a guess at the distance from the wrist to the center of the hand. Guessing that that is about the same as the distance between the eyes.

custom-block.s: Follow pose %l and adjust y by %n
Follow pose %l and adjust y by %n

scripts.comment: Adjust y by a guess at the distance from the wrist to the center of the hand. Guessing that that is about the same as the distance between the eyes.

custom-block.s: Follow pose %l and adjust y by %n
Follow pose %l and adjust y by %n
custom-block.comment: if confidence in the pose is above the threshold moves this sprite to the location of the pose element.

block-definition.comment: Reports the distance between two pose elements if they are visible. Otherwise a big number is reported.

block.comment: If not visible then report a number larger than any true distance.

block.l: Once everything has loaded you should see your eyes, wrists, and nose moving.

custom-block.s: body poses of costume %s %br using model %s %br using %txt coordinates %br with these options: %mult%s
custom-block.l: MoveNet is an ultra fast and accurate model that detects 17 keypoints of a body.

block.comment: 'poses' can report poses of each person in front of the camera. We only want one.
Tell the nose, eye, and wrist sprites to move to the new pose.

block.l: shortest distance between a wrist and an eye or nose
block.comment: Find the shortest distance from a hand.

block.var: shortest distance between a wrist and an eye or nose

block.comment: You can decide what is too close and how to react.
All is well. Remove any message being displayed.
No poses. Might be a temporary problem. Or no one is front of the camera. Or a camera isn't available.

scripts.comment: Compute the distances between each hand and the eyes and nose.

block.comment: Ignore pose locations that are less than 50% confident.
Only respond when a hand is closer than this distance to a nose or eye.

scripts.comment: Use this if you want to see yourself

watcher.var: shortest distance between a wrist and an eye or nose

variable.name: shortest distance between a wrist and an eye or nose
